content:
WORK IN PROGRESS! # ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration # Example config.yml:
discordToken: "YOUR_BOT_TOKEN" discordServerID: "YOUR_DISCORD_SERVER_ID" updatesChannelID: "DISCORD_CHANNEL_ID" joinMessage: "{player} has joined the Server!" leaveMessage: "{player} has left the Server!" Placeholders # {player} -> Use this to indicate the Username of the Player who joined/left the Minecraft Server.
üñ•Ô∏è Discord Commands # Command Description /setjoinmessage <message> Sets a new join message /setleavemessage <message> Sets a new join message /getjoinmessage Shows the current join message /getleavemessage Shows the current leave message
title: Discord Status Plugin

content: Welcome to my comprehensive documentation website! This platform serves as a centralized hub for all the projects, tools, and resources I’ve developed and shared on GitHub. Whether you’re a fellow developer, a student learning to code or someone interested in exploring innovative solutions, you’ll find detailed documentation, tutorials and insights into my work here.
section: Welcome to My Project Documentation Hub
title: Welcome to My Project Documentation Hub
